subject: Return Request - Order #SSN1525
description_text:
Hello,

I am requesting a return for all items in order #SSN1525


  *
Plus X P3-H3 / Black / Baseplate
  *
Elastomer White
  *
Elastomer Red

All of the items are unopened and unused, in their original box.

Please provide instructions to complete the return.  Thanks.

Regards,
Angelo Bovino

conversations.body_text: Hi Angelo Bovino,     Did you receive any defective products, please ask why you want to return them. If there are any problems, we can help you to solve them.

The product is not defective, the boxes are unopened and sealed in the original packaging.

I want to return them because I no longer want them

Regards,
Angelo Bovino

Hi Angelo Bovino,      Sorry, we are unable to accept returns if the product is not defective as we cannot accept the high shipping costs for sending and returning the goods. That's why we clearly state this in our return policy. I'm sorry for not being able to help you.

I am ok with paying the return shipping

Regards,
Angelo Bovino

Hi Angelo Bovino,    Ok, you can return the parcel to our US warehouse, the cost will be lower, please provide us with the logistics number after the parcel is shipped.  CAMZ Chino Warehouse (System Code: CAMZ)   Contact: Greg -MZ(1330006)   Phone: 480 387 3114   ADD: 14210 Telephone Ave, Chino, CA 91710 USA,Dock 4-10

Hello, the tracking number for the return is

1Z3B51YT0306169622

Regards,
Angelo Bovino
Hi Angelo Bovino,    Okay, we'll refund you once we've received the item in our warehouse and checked it for accuracy.

Hello,

I am following up on my return request. UPS tracking shows the package was delivered on Tuesday July 8th.

Do you have any updates? Thanks

Regards,
Angelo Bovino
